reviews.review: Great movie!!! Boy, when the "Captain" arrived that really made the movie for me. Thor is back. Will most definitely see this again.
While it would flop as a standalone, the MCU has a created a beast of a movie that is both emotional and wholly worthy to be called an epic blockbuster.
The best Marvel movie to date. No contest. What a showdown, absolutely cannot wait for part 2!
that will be the most epic superhero movie
it is AMAZING best marvel movie EVER (YET)
That 10 year wait was totally worth it is all I'm going to say. A movie far beyond its time.

With a fun script, good villian and fantastic balancing of all the characters makes Infinity war one of the most enjoyable MCU movies right under Guardians vol.2. One of the only negatives are the effects, with has taken a step down from Gotg vol. 2, I have yet to see black panther, but I hear it has the same cgi problem. All in all this is a fantastic and action packed movie.

It was destined to fail, yet, somehow, it succeeded. Inexplicably, film is perfect in every way-VFX, characters, action...how the directors ever managed to achieve this, I don't know.

This is by far the best superhero film made. Ever,

Incredibly well done. All the characters have an important role to play, even though there are about 24. You donï¿ 1/2 1/2(TM)t need to watch any of the other films to understand those charactersï¿ 1/2 1/2(TM) motivations, and the ending is one that no one was expecting. 10/10

10 years in the make from iron man 2008 to black panther and everything els inbetween infinity war is visual amazing well crafted and a whole lot of fun relying on the franchises last movies as a build up to the big event this film waste no time getting down and dirty it beginning where thor 3 ends and is s full hight stakes roller coaster through to the well known post credit scene thanos is one of the MCU best villains and well worth the wait for throwing asteroids at the avengers strangling  black panther on his way to get stones is there anything he can't do? the film may be packed with all its introduced characters from previous movies but it shakes up the teams giving it some fresh material like back in 2012 when we saw Thor meet stark and cap meet hulk however all is not joyful there is some edge of your seat suprosee and a lot of emotion maybe more depth and emotion than other previous movies indeed it is a hell of a film
